author: nishant0
content: So i fixed this one by actually providing the network config correctly, there weren't any docs so I kind of assumed maybe the builder fetched the config via the API. But once I applied the config this specific error disappeared. However I am getting constant failures at FCU calls via the builder

author: nishant0
content:
> i think the key thing is that you need to run a CL, have it use the builder as the engine endpoint; then configure the builder to use the EL as the engine endpoint "target"
yeap, this is what we do

author: nishant0
content: we have an engine-api proxy in our test setup, so we just replaced that with the builder
